page.title: 02TOURISM
page.content: TOURISM. The village of Churt is a quiet place with a few quiet lanes,and one big wider road.There is a hotel called The Pride of the Valley where you can stay overnight,or go for lunch or dinner.By the side of it is a road called Jumps Road;along the road are three hills they are called The Devil's Jumps because they are close together,like jumping.The hills are made of sandstone,and there is a lot of bracken and heather.From the top you can see Farnham and Frensham Little Pond down below.If you stand on the Jumps and look down at the Flashes,it looks like a puddle.The Flashes is a pond,a small pond,at Rushmoor;it is nice to paddle in and give your dogs a swim.It has woodland around it.
